The first thing that would happen is that everything would be upside down. People and objects would fall upwards instead of downwards.
The second thing that would happen is that all objects on Earth would be lifted off the ground. This would cause a lot of damage and destruction.
The third thing that would happen is that the oceans would empty out into space. This would cause a lot of and.
The fourth thing that would happen is that all forms of transportation would be rendered useless. Cars, planes, and ships would all stop moving.
The fifth thing that would happen is that the atmosphere would collapse. This would cause the temperature to drop rapidly and would make it impossible for humans to survive.
